summary: Adds a new spell "Touch of Force" to the players arsenal. Send em' to the sky!
descriptionHtml:
[font=Georgia]
[size=3][img]http://i29.photobucket.com/albums/c299/Infarock/tof-1.jpg[/img]﻿﻿

     There are several spell mods out there that use the Unrelenting Force formula, but honestly, I wasn't really happy with any of them. I wanted something more powerful, something that would blow people away, literally.  [/size][size=3]So I created Touch Of Force. A single, stand-alone spell mod. It works along the same lines as Unrelenting Force, but with twice as much force and a chance to disarm and moderately damage opponents. [/size][size=3]Touch Of Force is a novice-level destruction spell that uses a minimal amount of magicka, so yes, it is a bit OP (of course, sending an opponent halfway to the moon with the palm of your hand is going to be OP no matter how you look at it :)[/size][size=3]
[/size][size=3]     The spell tome to teach you Touch Of Force can be found on a wooden table in the kitchen of The Bannered Mare (see screenshot). [/size][size=3]I've also included an optional file titled "Force Unrelenting", that will give the Unrelenting Force shout the same increased pushback as Touch Of Force. [/size][size=3]No mod conflicts should be expected, unless you use "Force Unrelenting" with any other mod that affects Unrelenting Force. Also, any mods that affect the Bannered Mares kitchen tables area.
[/size][size=3]
[/size][size=3]    The latest version of Skyrim is all that is required. For installation I recommend NMM or for manual, just drop the ESPs in your Skyrim data folder.[/size][size=3]
[/size][size=3]
Thank you very much for your time and I hope you enjoy the mod :)


[youtube]T_yPcILcjy4[/youtube]


[/size]
[/font]
author: Jeremy Atkinson
